Field Detail

NUM_GENERATIONS

public static final int NUM_GENERATIONS
Number of generations to create branches. Play with this for coarser/finer detail.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NUM_CHILDREN

public static final int NUM_CHILDREN
Number of children for each branch. Play with this for sparser/fluffier trees.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final double GOLDEN_RATIO

computeEndpoint

public java.awt.geom.Point2D computeEndpoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D p,
                                             double length,
                                             double angle)
Compute the point that is length away from p at the angle. Uses cosine to get the new x coordinate, sine to get the new y coordinate.
